Race.Name: Dwarf
Race.Feature: Your speed is not reduced by heavy armor.
Advantage on saves vs poison and resistance to poison damage.
You have proficiency with battleaxe, handaxe, light hammer, and warhammer.
Proficiency with smith's tools, brewer's supplies, or mason's tools.

Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in History and add doubly your normal proficiency bonus instead of your regular proficiency.

Subrace.Name: Hill Dwarf
Subrace.Feature: +1 WIS
+1 HP at each level (including first).

Subrace.Name: Mountain Dwarf
Subrace.Feature: +2 STR
Proficiency with light and medium armor.

Race.Name: Elf
Race.Feature: Advantage on save vs charm and immunity to magical sleep.

Subrace.Name: High Elf
Subrace.Feature: +1 INT
Proficiency in longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.
You know one cantrip from the wizard list. INT is your casting ability for it.
You know (read/write/speak) one extra language of your choice.

Subrace.Name: Wood Elf
Subrace.Feature: +1 WIS
Proficiency in longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.
You can attempt to hide when lightly obscured by natural phenomena.

Subrace.Name: Dark Elf
Subrace.Feature: +1 CHA
Darkvision: 120ft.
Disadvantage on attack rolls and perception when you, your target, or the thing you are trying to percieve is in direct sunlight.
You know Dancing Lights. At 3rd level: Faerie Fire 1x/day. At 5th level: Darkness 1x/day. Use CHA.
Proficiency with rapiers, shortswords, and hand crossbows.

Race.Name: Halfling
Race.Feature: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check or saving throw you can reroll and must use the new value.
You can move through the space of any creature that has a size larger than yours.

Subrace.Name: Lightfoot Halfling
Subrace.Feature: +1 CHA
Can attempt to hide when obscured by a creature larger than you.

Subrace.Name: Stout Halfling
Subrace.Feature: +1 CON
Advantage on saves vs poison and resistance to poison damage.

Race.Name: Human
Race.Feature: Common and one extra of your choice.

Subrace.Name: Variant Human
Subrace.Feature: +1 to two of your choice.
Proficiency in 1 skill of your choice.
You gain one feat of your choice.

Race.Name: Dragonborn
Race.Feature: You have draconic ancestry. See table on PHB 34 for color--type mapping and details on breath weapon.
See table on PHB 34 for shape/size. DC is 8 + proficiency + CON. Damage is 2d6 (1st)/3d6 (6th)/4d6 (11th)/5d6 (16th). Recharges on short/long rest.
Resistance to damage type from table on PHB 34.

Race.Name: Gnome
Race.Feature: Advantage on INT, WIS, and CHA saves vs magic.

Subrace.Name: Forest Gnome
Subrace.Feature: +1 DEX.
You know Minor Illusion. Use INT.
You can communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts.

Subrace.Name: Rock Gnome
Subrace.Feature: +1 CON
Whenever you make an INT (History) check related to magic items, alchemical objects or technological devices use 2 x Proficiency instead of regular proficiency.
Proficiency with Tinker's Tools. See PHB 37 for details on uses/cost/etc.

Race.Name: Half-Elf
Race.Feature: +2 CHA, +1 to two others of your choice.
Advantage on save vs charm and immunity to magical sleep.
You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice

Race.Name: Half-Orc
Race.Feature: When you are reduced to 0 HP but not killed outright, you drop to 1 HP instead. Use 1x/Day
Add +1 weapon damage dice on crit.

Race.Name: Tiefling
Race.Feature: You know Thaumaturgy. At 3rd level: Hellish Rebuke (as 2nd level, 1x/day). At 5th level: Darkness 1x/day. Use CHA.
